B

BasicMap - Class in com.xd.cps2002.map
The BasicMap class is a concrete implementation of the Map class, and it contains the implementations of the Map.generate() and Map.isPlayable() functions particular to this type of map.
BasicMap(int) - Constructor for class com.xd.cps2002.map.BasicMap
Constructor used to initialize an empty BasicMap object.
BasicMap(TileType[][]) - Constructor for class com.xd.cps2002.map.BasicMap
Constructor used to initialize a BasicMap object with a pre-generated map.

BasicMapTest - Class in com.xd.cps2002.map
This class contains unit tests used to test both the methods of the abstract Map class and the concrete BasicMap class.
BasicMapTest() - Constructor for class com.xd.cps2002.map.BasicMapTest
 
belowMin_MapSize_genMapTest() - Method in class com.xd.cps2002.game.GameTest
Tests that an InvalidMapSizeException is thrown when the map_size is less than 5.
belowMin_MapSize_isValidMapSizeTest() - Method in class com.xd.cps2002.game.GameTest
Tests that false is returned when the map_size is less than 5, for any value of n_player.
belowMin_NoOfPlayers_genPlayersTest() - Method in class com.xd.cps2002.game.GameTest
Tests that an InvalidNumberOfPlayersException is thrown when the number of players is less than 2.
belowMin_NoOfPlayers_isValidNPlayersTest() - Method in class com.xd.cps2002.game.GameTest
Tests that false is returned when the number of players is less than 2.
belowMin_NoOfTeams_genTeamsTest() - Method in class com.xd.cps2002.game.GameTest
Tests that an InvalidNumberOfTeamsException is thrown when n_teams < 2, for any length of the players array.
belowMin_NoOfTeams_isValidNTeamsTest() - Method in class com.xd.cps2002.game.GameTest
Tests that false is returned when n_teams < 2, for any value of n_players.
